<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Read Lips](/Feats.aspx?ID=833) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 265 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)

</column>

---

You can read lips of others nearby who you can clearly see. When you're at your leisure, you can do this automatically. In encounter mode or when attempting a more difficult feat of lipreading, you're [fascinated](/Conditions.aspx?ID=14) and [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) during each round in which you focus on lip movements, and you must succeed at a [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) check (DC determined by the GM) to successfully read someone's lips. In either case, the language read must be one that you know.
name: Read Lips
